channel.title: "Logging into the same account twice" routine
channel.description:
I did this a long time ago, and posted it at autorune, and maybe somewhere else? But I dont think I did it here, so I thought I'd post it.
Keep in mind I thought of this in my head, if anyone else has done this or posted about this I had no idea.
I made two rs accounts, one named o.0h scary, and 0.0h scary. In the game the names show up the exact same! So I made my characters look the exact same too. So then I made one guy follow the other and was walking around with my two guys who look the exact same, and are spelt the same way, so obviously people notice this and I must have had 50 people following me asking how I did it. I told them them i was a h4x0r, and that I logged into one account twice, etc... Everyone believed me. It was so funny, here are some pics:
Right off tutorial Island [img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/1375/cool0ms.jpg[/img] Varrock East bank, I told them I could dupe items and shit and a lot of people got excited. [img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/7711/gdsgdfg5xj.jpg[/img] [img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/2869/untitled11pr.jpg[/img] The mod got pissed at me and muted me :( lol [img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/9581/stupidmod8tx.jpg[/img]
I hope I havnt posted this here. I searched and dint see it.

I made two rs accounts, one named o.0h scary, and 0.0h scary. In the game the names show up the exact same! So I made my characters look the exact same too. Varrock East bank, I told them I could dupe items and shit and a lot of people got excited.
